min_ram.description:
The minimum amount of RAM in MB that is required to boot the image.

If this field has no value, its value is ``null`` (JSON null data
type).

virtual_size.description:
The virtual size of the image.

If this field has no value, its value is ``null`` (JSON null data
type).

name.description:
The name of the image.

If this field has no value, its value is ``null`` (JSON null data
type).

checksum.description:
Hash of the image data used. The Image service uses this value for
verification.

If this field has no value, its value is ``null`` (JSON null data
type).

created_at.description:
The date and time when the server, image, or backup was created.

The date and time stamp format is `ISO 8601
<https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601>`_ :

::

   CCYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hh:mm

For example, ``2015-08-27T09:49:58-05:00``.

The ``±hh:mm`` value, if included, is the time zone as an offset
from UTC.

If the updated-at date and time stamp is not set, its value is
``null`` .

disk_format.description:
The disk format of the image.

If this field has no value, its value is ``null`` (JSON null data
type).

updated_at.description:
The date and time when the server or image was updated.

The date and time stamp format is `ISO 8601
<https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601>`_ :

::

   CCYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hh:mm

For example, ``2015-08-27T09:49:58-05:00``.

The ``±hh:mm`` value, if included, is the time zone as an offset
from UTC.

If the updated-at date and time stamp is not set, its value is
``null`` .

properties.description: Properties, if any, that are associated with the image.

self.description: URL for the virtual machine image.

owner.description:
The ID of the owner, or tenant, of the image.

If this field has no value, its value is ``null`` (JSON null data
type).

protected.description: Indicates whether the image can be deleted.

file.description: URL for the virtual machine image file.

container_format.description:
The container format of image.

If this field has no value, its value is ``null`` (JSON null data
type).

min_disk.description:
The minimum disk size in GB that is required to boot the image.

If this field has no value, its value is ``null`` (JSON null data
type).

size.description:
The size of the image data, in bytes.

If this field has no value, its value is ``null`` (JSON null data
type).

id.description: The unique ID for the image.

schema.description: URL for schema of the virtual machine image.
